articles.title: Pinoys affected by California wildfires climb to 191
articles.author: Pia Lee-Brago
articles.summary: Filipinos affected by wildfires in Southern California have risen to 191. There are more than 400,000 Filipinos living in Los Angeles County. 25 percent of Filipinos live in the most affected areas. The Department of Foreign Affairs authorized the consulate to extend an emergency assistance of $200 each to Filipinos.

articles.title: Australia hit by second hottest year on record in 2024
articles.summary: 2024 was Australia's second hottest year on record since 1910. The average national temperature for 2024 was 1.46°C higher than the 1961–1990 average. It is the first calendar year to surpass the established 1.5°C target set by the 2015 Paris Accords. The ten hottest years on record in Australia have all occurred since 2005.
